title: [Large-scale] Online Learning and Internet Literacy Enhancement Program for Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer operation skills and experience with internet access
context.additional_context: A practice-centered course utilizing personal devices, focusing on enhancing internet information search and evaluation skills

learning_goals: Learners can identify and access at least three reliable online medical information sources.
Learners can effectively find evidence needed for nursing practice within 10 minutes using search engines.
Learners can evaluate the credibility of online information based on three criteria: source, recency, and objectivity.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
